author: vors

comments.author: vors
comments.body: As a starting point, we can take https://github.com/PowerShell/psl-MMIN

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Please note that #507 is a really ancient start to this (and incorporating it for the Core PowerShell on Windows build).

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
Accidentally made a duplicate, summary:

### Move MMI/N out of tree and make NuGet package

Need a NuGet package in windows-build that provides real MMI on Windows and stub on Linux.

This is started with an [MMIN package](https://github.com/PowerShell/Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Native) and [removal of the project](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/andschwa/package-mmin).

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
And update from @dantraMSFT:

> As of this morning, we've decided to do two things; 1: Build a private version of MMI.Native that adds duplicate internalsvisibleto for PS/DSC assemblies using the public key from visualstudiopublic.snk.  2: Added a task to refactor our dependency to use the C# MMI that your team is creating.
> 
> ETA for #1 is today.  Since we're not doing coreclr yet, I plan on creating a package for DSC as part of the effort and move over to the repro work you've done - currently it is insufficient since it doesn't appear to address symbols or MMI.Native.Unmanaged

title: Replace Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Native by the real package on Full CLR build
